meta.label: Salesforce - Refresh the JSON token (legacy)
meta.description: Recipe to refresh the JSON token and save it on disk. Alternatively, you can use other authentication methods, see plugin's documentation.

params.name: client_id
params.label: Consumer Key
params.description: Client ID / Consumer Key of the Connected App

params.name: client_secret
params.label: Consumer Secret
params.description: Client Secret / Consumer Secret of the Connected App

params.name: email
params.label: Email
params.description: The email you use to connect to the Salesforce instance

params.name: password
params.label: Password and Security Token
params.description: Concatenate your password with your security token

params.name: path
params.label: File to store the JSON token
params.description: Will be used by datasets. Default: ${dip.home}/SalesforceToken.json

params.name: hide_access_token
params.label: Token hidden in dataset?
params.description: Should the access token be hidden in the dataset?
